verses.verse: Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5375>raise<s%> a <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H8088>report:<s%> <S%H7896>put<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> an <S%H2555>unrighteous<s%> <S%H5707>witness.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> a <S%H7227>multitude<s%> to do <S%H7451>evil;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou <S%H6030>speak<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> a <S%H7379>cause<s%> to <S%H5186>decline<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> to <S%H5186>wrest<s%> judgment:
Neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou <S%H1921>countenance<s%> a poor <S%H1800>man<s%> in his <S%H7379>cause.<s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H6293>meet<s%> thine <S%H341>enemy's<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H2543>ass<s%> going <S%H8582>astray,<s%> thou shalt surely bring it back to him <S%H7725>again.<s%> <S%H7725><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2543>ass<s%> of him that <S%H8130>hateth<s%> thee <S%H7257>lying<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H4853>burden,<s%> and wouldest <S%H2308>forbear<s%> to <S%H4480>help<s%> <S%H5800><s%> him, thou shalt surely <S%H5800>help<s%> <S%H5800><s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him.
Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5186>wrest<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of thy <S%H34>poor<s%> in his <S%H7379>cause.<s%>

Keep thee <S%H7368>far<s%> from a false <S%H4480>matter;<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H8267><s%> and the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> and <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H2026>slay<s%> thou <S%H408>not:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6663>justify<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7810>gift:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H7810>gift<s%> <S%H5786>blindeth<s%> the <S%H6493>wise,<s%> and <S%H5557>perverteth<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>

Also thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3905>oppress<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger:<s%> for <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5315>heart<s%> of a <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> <S%H3588>seeing<s%> ye <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H1616>strangers<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
And <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt <S%H2232>sow<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H776>land,<s%> and shalt gather <S%H622>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8393>fruits<s%> thereof:

But the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> year thou shalt let it <S%H8058>rest<s%> and lie <S%H5203>still;<s%> that the <S%H34>poor<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H398>eat:<s%> and what they <S%H3499>leave<s%> the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H398>eat.<s%> In like <S%H3651>manner<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>deal<s%> with thy <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> and with thy <S%H2132>oliveyard.<s%>

Six <S%H8337><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> thy <S%H4639>work,<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> thou shalt <S%H7673>rest:<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> thine <S%H7794>ox<s%> and thine <S%H2543>ass<s%> may <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of thy <S%H519>handmaid,<s%> and the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> may be <S%H5314>refreshed.<s%>

And in <S%H3605>all<s%> things <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you be <S%H8104>circumspect:<s%> and make no <S%H2142>mention<s%> <S%H3808><s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> let it be <S%H8085>heard<s%> out <S%H5921>of<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
Three <S%H7969><s%> <S%H7272>times<s%> thou shalt keep a <S%H2287>feast<s%> unto me in the <S%H8141>year.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread:<s%> (thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee, in the time <S%H4150>appointed<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> in it thou camest <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4480>Egypt:<s%> <S%H4714><s%> and <S%H3808>none<s%> shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me empty: <S%H7387>)<s%>

And the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> of thy <S%H4639>labors,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H2232>sown<s%> in the <S%H7704>field:<s%> and the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H614>ingathering,<s%> which is in the <S%H3318>end<s%> of the <S%H8141>year,<s%> when thou hast gathered <S%H622>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H4639>labors<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

Three <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H2138>males<s%> shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H113>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>GOD.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2076>offer<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of my <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> leavened <S%H2557>bread;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of my <S%H2282>sacrifice<s%> <S%H3885>remain<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

The <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> of thy <S%H127>land<s%> thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God.<s%> Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1310>seethe<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> in his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H2461>milk.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> an <S%H4397>Angel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> thee in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and to <S%H935>bring<s%> thee <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H3559>prepared.<s%>

Beware <S%H8104><s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him, and <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H4843>provoke<s%> him <S%H408>not;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5375>pardon<s%> your <S%H6588>transgressions:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7130>in<s%> him.

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518>if<s%> thou shalt indeed <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H8085><s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I <S%H1696>speak;<s%> then I will be an <S%H340>enemy<s%> <S%H853><s%> unto thine <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and an <S%H6696>adversary<s%> <S%H853><s%> unto thine <S%H6887>adversaries.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> mine <S%H4397>Angel<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, and bring thee <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites:<s%> and I will cut them <S%H3582>off.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to their <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> after their <S%H4639>works:<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> thou shalt utterly <S%H2040>overthrow<s%> <S%H2040><s%> them, and quite break <S%H7665>down<s%> <S%H7665><s%> their <S%H4676>images.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and he shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and thy <S%H4325>water;<s%> and I will take sickness <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H4245><s%> from the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H7130><s%> of thee.

There shall <S%H3808>nothing<s%> cast their <S%H1961>young,<s%> <S%H7921><s%> nor be <S%H6135>barren,<s%> in thy <S%H776>land:<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of thy <S%H3117>days<s%> I will <S%H4390>fulfill.<s%>

I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H367>fear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, and will <S%H2000>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> thou shalt <S%H935>come,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> turn their <S%H6203>backs<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee.

And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6880>hornets<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, which shall drive <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee.

I will <S%H3808>not<s%> drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>year;<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> and the <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H7227>multiply<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee.

By <S%H4592>little<s%> and <S%H4592>little<s%> I will drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> thou be <S%H6509>increased,<s%> and <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And I will <S%H7896>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1366>bounds<s%> from the Red <S%H4480>sea<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H5488><s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and from the <S%H4480>desert<s%> <S%H4057><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H5104>river:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and thou shalt drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee.
Thou shalt <S%H3772>make<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them, nor with their <S%H430>gods.<s%>

They shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in thy <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> they make thee <S%H2398>sin<s%> <S%H853><s%> against me: <S%H3588>for<s%> if thou <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H430>gods,<s%> it will <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H4170>snare<s%> unto thee.
